575.last_action: Committee recommended measure be held for further study
575.title: Gender Discrimination
575.description: Prohibit discrimination by nursing facilities, assisted living residences, home nursing care providers and home care providers on the basis of sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression.

670.last_action: Committee recommended measure be held for further study
670.title: Children
670.description: Increase the minimum age to buy and sell tobacco products from eighteen (18) years to twenty-one (21) years.

1179.title: House Resolution Creating A Special Legislative Commission To Investigate Issues Of Fairness In The Hiring And Retention Of Certain Faculty Members And Employees Of The University Of Rhode Island (creates A Five (5) Member Special Legislative Investigative Commission Whose Purpose Is To Investigate Issues Of Fairness At Uri In Hiring And Retention Of Faculty And Employees Based On Sexual Orientation Or Gender Identity.)
1179.description: House Resolution Creating A Special Legislative Commission To Investigate Issues Of Fairness In The Hiring And Retention Of Certain Faculty Members And Employees Of The University Of Rhode Island (creates A Five (5) Member Special Legislative Investigative Commission Whose Purpose Is To Investigate Issues Of Fairness At Uri In Hiring And Retention Of Faculty And Employees Based On Sexual Orientation Or Gender Identity.)
